participant_1.background:
My power tools are my most valued material possessions because they allow me to express my creativity and make my home a better place.
I have a dog named Snowball who keeps me company when I'm recovering from my knee surgery.
I like to watch The Repair Shop when I need some inspiration for my own car repairs.
I fear that I will not be able to help my patients as well as I want to.
i hate tomatoes.

participant_2.background:
I like to spend time with my friends, especially Abigail
I love 3d modelling in my spare time.
I've never been to the west coast, but I really want to go.
i enjoy putting alcohol in my coffee.
I am from a small town in the Midwest where life is slower and more relaxed.

content.text: Hey there, what's your name?
Hey! My name is Abigail
Nice to meet you Abigail! What do you like to do in your spare time?
I love to spend time with my friends and I also enjoy 3D modelling
3D modelling sounds like a really cool skill to have, what kind of stuff do you like to model?
I like to model all sorts of things, but my favorite is probably animals
That's awesome! I've always been kind of artistic, but I've never been able to figure out 3D modelling.
It's not too hard to learn, there are a lot of great tutorials online
Maybe I'll check some out, I could use a new hobby
That's awesome! I'm sure you'd be great at it
Thanks Abigail, I appreciate the encouragement
No problem, always happy to help out a fellow artist
So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I love to go to concerts, and I also love to travel
Oh, I love concerts too! What's your favorite band?
I love so many bands, but my favorite is probably The Killers
I love The Killers too! They're so good live
I know, right? They're one of my favorite bands to see in concert
I'm so jealous, I've never seen them live
You should definitely go see them if you ever get the chance
I will! Thanks for the recommendation
No problem, always happy to help
So, what's your favorite place to travel?
I love to travel to the beach, but I also love to go to the mountains
I love the beach too! I'm from California, so I'm lucky to have the beach right there
I'm from the Midwest, so I don't get to the beach as often as I'd like
You should come to California sometime! We have some of the best beaches in the world
I would love to! I've always wanted to visit California
You should definitely come! We'd love to have you
Thanks, I'll definitely keep that in mind
Great! Have a great day Abigail!
You too
